titles.title: Recognizing Honor Flight Michigan, Inc., for its important work in recognizing World War II veterans and expressing condolences to the family and friends of David Cameron following his death.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/23/2008--Introduced. Honors the mission of Honor Flight Michigan and the World War II veterans who served our country. Recognizes the patriotism of David and Carole Cameron, co-founders of Honor Flight Michigan. Mourns the loss of David Cameron.
